author: Ali Dukakis
title: China using software surveillance to track COVID-19, alarming human rights advocates
description: The Chinese government has begun to track some of its citizens through software that analyzes their personal data.
content:
Wuhan, China, where the first reported cases of novel coronavirus emerged ten weeks ago, reopened its borders last week. Theres just one catch: A government surveillance app is required to enter and exit the region.
The Chinese government has begun to track … [+5166 chars]
